name: Chicken Knife Agility Game For the Not so Brave: Safety First - Free Edition
name_original: Chicken Knife Agility Game For the Not so Brave: Safety First - Free Edition
description:
Here comes the weekends and the Craques Potes Family is in a mood to play all together. Today they are up to play what they call: the Chicken Knife Agility Game For the Not so Brave : Safety First game as family competition. Get set and let the competition BEGIN!

Instead to play this with a knife, they use feather, straw and pencil which are not gonna hurt their fingers.

Here you go! The grandfather starting the round, He Spreads his fingers on table and make feather dancing between them. .

Let’s give everyone the chance to win the game and enjoy the thrill of winning the rounds as fast as you can!

Features:

- 4 hands with 3 weapons to unlock for competition
- Many backgrounds: picnic table cloths, school desk and comic books with cool sound track for more fun experience

How to play?

- Spread your fingers and make feather, straw and pencil dancing between your fingers.
- Make ready your mind for more speed to unlock new hands
- Remind that you need to DO NOT TOUCH your finger with the weapons

So are you ready to see the tough competition of Craques Potes Family in real?

Follow the Craques Potes Family on facebook : http://craquespotes.com/facebook

Any suggestions and/or feedbacks?
Follow The Craques Potes Family at: family@craquespotes.com
